amendatorysection.para: It is the duty of any person who discovers, suspects, or has reason to believe that any sheep or goat belonging to him or her or which he or she has in his or her possession or custody or which, belonging to another, may come under his or her observation, is affected with signs consistent with scrapie to immediately report such fact, belief, or suspicion to the department or to any agent, employee, or appointee thereof.
